metadata.name: SAPHIRO
metadata.description:
The first in the Crypto Space Dragons series.

The Guide. A spirited, playful dragon, Saphiro shifts between the light and darkness, navigating his way through galaxies and leaving signs and symbols within nebulas so that others might follow him to safer paths.
After Gathering space dust on his tail, he uses it to paint pictures within nebulas, knowing where the light hits and forms each color.
